00031 class DZ_EXPORT DzContentSearchOptions : public QObject , public DzRefCountedItem
00032 {
00033     Q_OBJECT
00034     Q_ENUMS( SortBy SortOrder SaleItems PlatinumClub PlatinumSale Vendor )
00035     Q_PROPERTY( SortBy sortBy READ getSortBy WRITE setSortBy )
00036     Q_PROPERTY( SortOrder sortOrder READ getSortOrder WRITE setSortOrder )
00037     Q_PROPERTY( SaleItems saleItems READ getSaleItems WRITE setSaleItems )
00038     Q_PROPERTY( PlatinumClub platinumClub READ getPlatinumClub WRITE setPlatinumClub )
00039     Q_PROPERTY( PlatinumSale platinumSale READ getPlatinumSale WRITE setPlatinumSale )
00040     Q_PROPERTY( Vendor vendor READ getVendor WRITE setVendor )
00041     Q_PROPERTY( bool saleItemFilter READ getSaleItemFilter WRITE setSaleItemFilter )
00042     Q_PROPERTY( bool platClubFilter READ getPlatClubFilter WRITE setPlatClubFilter )
00043     Q_PROPERTY( bool platSaleFilter READ getPlatSaleFilter WRITE setPlatSaleFilter )
00044     Q_PROPERTY( bool vendorFilter READ getVendorFilter WRITE setVendorFilter )
00045     Q_PROPERTY( Store storeFilter READ getStoreFilter WRITE setStoreFilter )
00046 
00047 public:
00048     enum SortBy { None, Popularity, Date, Price, Alphabetical };
00049     enum SortOrder{ Ascending, Descending };
00050     enum SaleItems{ OnSale, NotOnSale };
00051     enum PlatinumClub { PlatClub, NonPlatClub };
00052     enum PlatinumSale { PlatSale, NonPlatSale };
00053     enum Vendor { DazOriginal, PublishedArtist };
00054     enum Store { Standard = 0x01, Developer = 0x02, All = Standard | Developer };
00055 
00056 
00057     DzContentSearchOptions();
00058     DzContentSearchOptions( const DzContentSearchOptions *other );
00059     virtual ~DzContentSearchOptions();
00060

00063     void            setSortOrder( SortOrder val );
00064     void            setSaleItems( SaleItems val );

00066     SaleItems       getSaleItems();
00067     PlatinumClub    getPlatinumClub();
00068     void            setPlatinumClub( PlatinumClub val );
00069     PlatinumSale    getPlatinumSale();
00070     void            setPlatinumSale( PlatinumSale val );
00071     Vendor          getVendor();
00072     void            setVendor( Vendor val );
00073     bool            getSaleItemFilter();
00074     void            setSaleItemFilter( bool val );
00075     bool            getPlatClubFilter();
00076     void            setPlatClubFilter( bool val );
00077     bool            getPlatSaleFilter();
00078     void            setPlatSaleFilter( bool val );
00079     bool            getVendorFilter();
00080     void            setVendorFilter( bool val );
00081     Store           getStoreFilter();
00082     void            setStoreFilter( Store val );
